Source.Name: gpsbabel
Source.Summary: A GPS data (waypoints, tracks, and routes) format convertor
Source.Description: GPSBabel converts waypoints, tracks, and routes from one format to another, whether that format is a common mapping format like Delorme, Streets and Trips, or even a serial or USB upload or download to a GPS receiver such as those from Garmin and Magellan. It contains extensive data manipulation abilities making it a convenient for server-side processing or as the backend for other tools.
